channel.title: Any HTML+CSS-minded folk want to dip their feet into building a full webapp? (Book kickstarter)
channel.description:
Hey bootstrappers,
My partner just launched [a Kickstarter for a book](https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1868398473/hello-web-app-intro-to-building-web-apps-with-djan) she's writing focused on guiding people with some web experience (typically just editing Wordpress themes or whatever) into building a full web app using Django:
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1868398473/hello-web-app-intro-to-building-web-apps-with-djan
Hope this might be helpful for some fellow bootstrapping entrepreneurs here. She's one of us, having started http://weddinglovely.com/ on her own after learning how to code (coming from a design background).

item.title: Any HTML+CSS-minded folk want to dip their feet into building a full webapp? (Book kickstarter)
item.dc:creator: shazow
item.description:
Hey bootstrappers,

My partner just launched a Kickstarter for a book she’s writing focused on guiding people with some web experience (typically just editing Wordpress themes or whatever) into building a full web app using Django:

Kickstarter

Hello Web App: Intro to building web apps with Django

Learn to code your first web app! Tailored to non-programmers, written by a designer. Released both as an e-book and paperback.

Hope this might be helpful for some fellow bootstrapping entrepreneurs here. She’s one of us, having started http://weddinglovely.com/ on her own after learning how to code (coming from a design background).

Read full topic
item.source: Any HTML+CSS-minded folk want to dip their feet into building a full webapp? (Book kickstarter)
